circumstances: Following a short takeoff roll, the pilot initiated a left turn at low height when the airplane struck trees and crashed in flames in a wooded area. All seven occupants were injured, one seriously, and the aircraft was destroyed.
probable_cause:
Premature lift-off on part of the pilot who failed to obtain/maintain flying speed. The following contributing factors were reported: 
- Rotation at mid-field, 
- Presence of 60 feet tall trees.
